content:
Enable Quick Text

To enable quick text, go to Setup and search for "Quick Text Settings". Click Enable Quick Text. Optionally, select Share and organize quick text in folders or Hide quick text button and pop-up. Click Save.

Customize the categories used to organize quick text messages by clicking Fields & Relationships, then click Category, and edit the values listed in the Category Picklist Values section.

Required editions: Group, Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions (in Salesforce Classic); Essentials, Professional, Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions (in Lightning Experience).

User permissions needed: Customize Application.
title: Enabling Quick Text in Service Cloud
